sqlMap.select: /* loginXP.retrieveLoginInfo */ SELECT A.USER_ID , A.PWD AS PASSWORD , A.USER_KNM AS USER_NM FROM SY_USER A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.USER_ID = #userId#

/* loginXP.userLogin */ SELECT A.USER_ID , A.ORG_CD , A.USER_TP_CD , A.USER_KNM AS USER_NM , A.USER_ENM , A.PWD AS PASSWD , A.PWD_CHG_DT , A.EMAIL , A.TELNO AS PHONE , A.MPHONE_NO AS M_PHONE , A.FAXNO , A.ZIPCD , A.BAS_ADDR , A.DTL_ADDR , A.NAT_CD , A.LOCL_CD , A.USER_POSIT_CD , A.USER_RPSWRK_CD , A.USER_JOBSP_CD , A.USE_YN , A.EMP_NO , A.DEPT_CODE , B.CPR_CODE
FROM SY_USER A , V_SY_DEPT B WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE
A.USE_YN = #useYn#
A.USER_ID = #userId#
A.USER_ID = #loginId#
A.EMP_NO = #empNo#
A.EMAIL = #email#
A.USER_TP_CD = #userTpCd#
A.USER_TP_CD IN (#userTpCds#)

/* loginXP.userEtcInfo */ SELECT A.USER_POSIT_CD , A.USER_RPSWRK_CD , A.USER_JOBSP_CD , A.USER_DUTY_CD FROM SY_USER A
A.USE_YN = #useYn#
A.USER_ID = #userId#
A.USER_ID = #loginId#
A.EMPNO = #empno#
A.EMAIL = #email#
A.USER_TP_CD = #userTpCd#
A.USER_TP_CD IN (#userTpCds#)

/* loginXP.userEtcInfoChg */ SELECT A.USER_POSIT_CD , A.USER_RPSWRK_CD , A.USER_JOBSP_CD , A.USER_DUTY_CD FROM SY_APPT A WHERE ROWNUM = 1
NVL(A.APPT_ED_YMD, '99999999') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
A.USER_ID = #userId#
A.ORG_CD = #orgCd#
/* loginXP.retrieveBiz */ SELECT B.* FROM SY_USER A WHERE A.USER_ID = #userId#

/* loginXP.chkUserLogin */ SELECT A.USER_ID FROM SY_USER A
A.USE_YN = #useYn#
A.USER_ID = #userId#
A.USER_ID = #loginId#
A.EMPNO = #empno#
A.EMAIL = #email#
A.USER_TP_CD = #userTpCd#
A.USER_TP_CD IN (#userTpCds#)

/* loginXP.userPrivList */ SELECT priv_cd AS code FROM SY_USER_CTG_PRIV WHERE user_id = #userId#
#today# BETWEEN priv_st_ymd AND priv_ed_ymd

/* loginXP.retrieveOrgOfcr */ SELECT A.USER_ID , A.USER_ID AS LOGIN_ID , A.EMP_NO , A.PWD , A.USER_KNM , A.TELNO , A.EMAIL , A.USE_YN , A.LOCL_CD , A.NAT_CD , A.ORG_CD , (SELECT FN_SY_GET_ORG_NM(A.ORG_CD) FROM DUAL) AS ORG_NM , A.USER_TP_CD , A.MPHONE_NO FROM SY_USER A WHERE A.USER_ID = ( SELECT HORG_EMPL_NO FROM SY_ORG WHERE ORG_CD = ( SELECT ORG_CD FROM SY_USER WHERE USER_ID = #userId# ) )

/* loginXP.retrieveOrgList */ SELECT A.ORG_CD , A.ORG_CD SITE_CD , A.HGR_ORG_CD , A.HGR_ORG_CD AS CENTER_ORG_CD , A.ORG_NM , A.ORG_NM SITE_NM , A.ORG_ABBRNM , A.ORG_ABBRNM SITE_ABBRNM , A.ORG_NM_EN , A.ORG_CHRC_CLS , A.USE_YN , A.CT_DEPT_CODE , A.FC_DEPT_CODE , D.CRNCY_CODE CURRENCY , B.CPR_CODE , C.NATION_CODE NAT_CD , C.DATE_FRMT, C.CURR_FRMT, C.HOTEL_GRD, C.HOTEL_MNG_TP, C.MDM_USE_AT, C.ERP_USE_AT, C.MOIN_USE_AT FROM SY_ORG A , (SELECT DISTINCT CPR_CODE, ORG_CD FROM V_SY_DEPT) B , SY_GROUP_CTG_SITE C , SY_CM_CPR_CODE D WHERE A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD(+) AND A.ORG_CD = C.SITE_CD(+) AND B.CPR_CODE = D.CPR_CODE
A.QRY_YN = 'Y'
A.ORG_CD = #orgCd#
A.ORG_NM LIKE '%'||#orgNm#||'%'
/* loginXP.retrieveNatList */ SELECT NATION_CODE , NATION_NM , IOS_NATION_CODE FROM SY_NATION_CODE WHERE NATION_CODE = #natCd#
